shortdesc.ph: Check whether the device supports the camera flash function.

section.p: This method needs to be called after the camera is started (for example, by calling or ).
section.note: The app enables the front camera by default. If your front camera does not support the flash function, this method returns false. If you want to check whether the rear camera supports the flash function, call before this method.

ul.li: : The device supports the camera flash function.
: The device does not support the camera flash function.
